----
* Install
----
1. First of all, unpack archive file
 =tar xzf fsvn-(version).tar.gz=
2. If you have `make' command, `cd' to the directory where you unpacked fsvn.
  1. When to use on NTEmacs, read mw32cmp.el header to prepare.
  2. Edit MAKE-CFG.el and Makefile.
  3. Optionally invoke the following command show installed files where to go.
    =make what-where=
  4. Invoke the following command.
    =make install=
3. If you have no `make' command simply copy &#42;.el files to `load-path' where you want.
